name: compliance
description: Regulatory and license compliance with scanning, remediation, and documentation agents

agents.name: scanner
agents.role: License audit, SBOM generation, dependency risk assessment, known vulnerability scanning, policy violation detection

agents.name: remediator
agents.role: Replace problematic dependencies, add required license notices, fix policy violations, update to compliant versions
agents.focus: src/, lib/, package.json, go.mod, LICENSE, NOTICE

agents.name: documenter
agents.role: Compliance reports, audit trail documentation, data flow diagrams, privacy impact assessments, policy documentation
